name: Mayhue
description:
A & D to move. Space to jump. W & S to climb. Escape to pause.

(I've been made aware of a bug at the blue orb on level 4 that freezes the game if you jump on the tower roof. So don't jump on tower roof and you should be fine)

Mayhue is a game made for the two week LvL Up Beginner Jam. The theme of the Jam was Foreign Entity.

Richard Mayhew is an office worker in London, the sudden news that his mother is made all the more worse by the emergence of a dark force that pursues him into a colourful fantasy world. He navigates his way through this unknown land as colour is drained from the world around him.

Mayhue is a short platforming game that follows the journey of Richard Mayhew.

It is the first game I've ever made and I'm quite happy with how it came out.
